Uses of Package
org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine

  • Packages that use org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.config  
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.controller  
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine  
  • Classes in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine used by org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.config 
    Class and Description
    SkipperStateMachineService
    Service class for state machine hiding its operational logic.
  • Classes in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine used by org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.controller 
    Class and Description
    SkipperStateMachineService
    Service class for state machine hiding its operational logic.
  • Classes in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine used by org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAction
    Base class for Actions wanting to automatically wrap its execution in try/catch and add exception into extended state for further processing for interested parties.
    AbstractUpgradeStartAction
    Base class for upgrade related Actions wanting some shared functionality.
    DeleteDeleteAction
    StateMachine Action handling delete with a ReleaseService.
    ErrorAction
    StateMachine Action handling global error.
    InstallInstallAction
    StateMachine Action handling calls to ReleaseService install methods depending if either InstallRequest or InstallProperties exists in a message header.
    ResetVariablesAction
    StateMachine Action which simply clears extended state variables.
    RollbackStartAction
    StateMachine Action preparing a rollback.
    SkipperStateMachineService
    Service class for state machine hiding its operational logic.
    SkipperStateMachineService.SkipperEvents
    Enumeration of all possible events used by a machine.
    SkipperStateMachineService.SkipperStates
    Enumeration of all possible states used by a machine.
    SkipperStateMachineService.SkipperVariables
    Extended state variable names for skipper statemachine.
    UpgradeCancelAction
    StateMachine Action
    UpgradeCheckNewAppsGuard
    A Guard using extended state variable SkipperStateMachineService.SkipperVariables.UPGRADE_STATUS to determine condition based on initialised upgradeStatus flag.
    UpgradeCheckTargetAppsAction
    StateMachine Action checking upgrade status with an UpgradeStrategy.
    UpgradeDeleteSourceAppsAction
    StateMachine Action accepting app with an UpgradeStrategy.
    UpgradeDeployTargetAppsAction
    StateMachine Action deploying app with an UpgradeStrategy.
    UpgradeDeployTargetAppsFailedAction
    StateMachine Action which simple sends an event to machine to cancel an upgrade.
    UpgradeDeployTargetAppsSucceedAction
    StateMachine Action which simple sends an event to machine to accept an upgrade.
    UpgradeStartAction
    StateMachine Action preparing upgrage logic and adds ReleaseAnalysisReport and cutoff time to a context.
